text: What is difference between deal to lineitem and lineitem to deal association API?
their definition id is different but I don't really know their real difference?
In the HubSpot dashboard when I create a deal, I can associate lineitem with the deal. So if I want to achieve the same usecase with API do I do deal to lineitem or lineitem to deal?
Also in the docs with the api request I can only send request with hapikey, how do I get the API key? Also why can't it use access token just like how nodejs HubSpot client does?
